metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8840 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.0.0 through 2.9.10.2 lacks certain xbean-reflect/JNDI blocking, as demonstrated by org.apache.xbean.propertyeditor.JndiConverter. It was discovered that Jackson Databind incorrectly handled deserialization. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.1-1').
